cluster_relations.rel_desc: Food offerings specifically provide sustenance in the afterlife.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject provides, supplies, or contributes a beneficial outcome or resource expressed by the object.
cluster_relations.object_class_label: Ancient Egyptian Afterlife Beliefs and Concepts
cluster_relations.object_class_group: Ancient Egyptian Funerary Religion and Culture

qualifiers.SpatialQualifier: wherever the deceased exists after death
qualifiers.ConditionExpression: assuming the deceased can consume offerings
qualifiers.UncertaintyQualifier: implied association between food and sustenance
